alert.note: Alert for Rosebud (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 09 at 8:48PM MDT until July 10 at 4:00AM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 915 PM MDT FOR NORTH CENTRAL ROSEBUD COUNTY... At 847 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 22 miles northeast of Melstone, or 33 miles north of Hysham, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail and wind damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of north central Rosebud County. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: This is a dangerous storm. Prepare immediately for large destructive hail capable of producing significant damage. People outside should move to a shelter, inside a strong building and away from windows. This thunderstorm is capable of producing all types of severe weather including extremely large hail, destructive straight line winds and tornadoes.
